DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether LED phototherapy use combine red near infrared light ( approve : Ministry Health Russian Federation No . 29/06070997/1080-00 , EUROCAT Certificate No . CP033321-IV ) effective treatment musculoligamentous lesion physiotherapy practice
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis acute chronic musculoligamentous lesion Must able understand instruction fill auto administer questionnaire Informed consent Use oral corticosteroid corticosteroid injection Systemic diseases General contraindication phototherapy
